tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_equipment_inventory (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity_in_stock INT,
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE security_cameras (
    camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    resolution VARCHAR(20),
    status ENUM('active', 'inactive'),
    last_checked_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE access_badges (
    badge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    badge_holder_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    issue_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE,
    access_level ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high')
);

CREATE TABLE surveillance_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_time TIMESTAMP,
    camera_id INT,
    badge_id INT,
    event_type ENUM('entry', 'exit', 'movement'),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE security_equipment (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  position VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  manager_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  log_description TEXT
);
